english.segment1: The fire breathes, the fire breathes, it grows and grows and seems to have no end.
english.segment2: The fire breathes, the fire feeds. Search and search, consuming everything it sees.
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. It lives inside of me, burning, burning, burning (yeah, yeah). It lives inside of me. The fire breathes.
english.segment4: The fire breathes, the fire breathes. The beauty in its violence brings me peace.
english.segment5: The fire breathes, the fire breeds. It lives in hearts, causing strength to believe.
english.segment7: The fire breathes. and I need. life in this dead man to make me free.
